dogecoin.text: @DogeAccept @RichDevX @OneGoodShibe @DogecoinFdn @dogecoin Such a tour de force of unbridled lack of proactivity.
@DogeAccept @RichDevX @OneGoodShibe @DogecoinFdn @dogecoin Forgot: good bye.

@DogeAccept @RichDevX @OneGoodShibe @DogecoinFdn @dogecoin Why are you asking if it's me when you could just link to the fucking post or include my name in the screenshot? It's not only unclever, but it doesn't produce anything productive to ask if that's me. Of course it's me, I wrote it. Why am I wasting time answering that question

@RichDevX @OneGoodShibe @DogeAccept @DogecoinFdn @dogecoin My post here is far more directed at a broader subset of people, wherein you're included, and covers a wide range of things. I don't frankly care at this point for what you do or don't think I'm targeting you within that post. I'm not asking you questions anymore because you
@DogeAccept @RichDevX @OneGoodShibe @DogecoinFdn @dogecoin @DogecoinFdn <-- see that? That's their name. That's why I call them Dogecoin Foundation. It's very sound in reason.

@RichDevX @OneGoodShibe @DogeAccept @DogecoinFdn @dogecoin I'm looking directly at it. The Foundation is writing proposals and wants to offer those proposals up to the consensus for the network. You, Accept, one good shibe, and I assume others are saying please don't allow the Foundation to implement PoS at some level, while the

@RichDevX @OneGoodShibe @DogeAccept @DogecoinFdn @dogecoin Okay, so you want the Foundation included, if they change certain things about themselves to your liking? 

That's just simple, but with extra steps.

@RichDevX @OneGoodShibe @DogeAccept @DogecoinFdn @dogecoin Dude, do you want the Dogecoin Foundation excluded from the Dogecoin community or not? Holy shit, what is this a fuckin Senate hearing- answer the fucking question. You don't even know where you stand with it or you can't publicly state how you feel about it in simple terms?

@RichDevX @OneGoodShibe @DogeAccept @DogecoinFdn @dogecoin From what Dogecoin? I don't want anybody excluded from Dogecoin. If Pol Pot himself returned from the dead and submitted code for community review, it doesn't matter does it?
@RichDevX @OneGoodShibe @DogeAccept @DogecoinFdn @dogecoin So say you want to exclude them. Have I built some insurmountable task for you? I don't think I have.

@RichDevX @OneGoodShibe @DogeAccept @DogecoinFdn @dogecoin So do you want them included or excluded or are you now on the fence about Dogecoin being inclusive?

Tbh, I see them as wanting to be included. Pretty well-defined sentiment on the Foundation website and well-indicated by >0 participation in submitting commits to Dogecoin
@RichDevX @OneGoodShibe @DogeAccept @DogecoinFdn @dogecoin The Dogecoin community.
@RichDevX @OneGoodShibe @DogeAccept @DogecoinFdn @dogecoin I would hope nobody at all, honestly. Do you want them included or excluded?

@RichDevX @OneGoodShibe @DogeAccept @DogecoinFdn @dogecoin Cool, so we will be including people that would also seek to offer up the possibility of any type of PoS activities to be decided upon by the community, right?

Or is that where the Dogecoin community draws the line at inclusivity?

@dogenepal_ @OneGoodShibe @DogeAccept @DogecoinFdn @dogecoin I don't understand how you are helping the blockchain more than the Foundation is, but you're bio is sick af (coming from a cannabis and cannabinoid biologist) so you get a follow lmao

@chromatic_x @OneGoodShibe @DogeAccept @DogecoinFdn @dogecoin I appreciate this straightforward description, but if Dogecoin were to shift to PoS, Dogecoin Core would need to itself be made PoS by devs and would then have to be further implemented by a consensus of those who would download and then start running the nodes, correct?
@OneGoodShibe @DogeAccept @DogecoinFdn @dogecoin Not a threat to Dogecoin Core.

@OneGoodShibe @DogeAccept @DogecoinFdn @dogecoin Here's one with more context, now do you have the one with full context?
https://t.co/Klzrz26D7u
@RichDevX @DogeAccept @DogecoinFdn @dogecoin They want to be called Dogecoin Foundation without building a single thing related to Dogecoin Core?
For the record, I'm telling my friends and family to buy Dogecoin and use it as a currency. Right now.
Holy wow, @SiriL_Official accepts Dogecoin for donations! (It's too bad they left X because they're upset with Elon- pretty lame reason to leave your userbase hanging) https://t.co/9OBCWyCBsx
@TDogewhisperer Would be *cheaper* to send if it was paid in Dogecoin

@DogeAccept Hell yeah that was a good one. Dogecoin will always be my go-to for everyday transactional activity, but LT. and BTC remain my other two favorites. I'll definitely look more into things like Garlicoin, Banana, and Mona just to read up on my history, if nothing else. Thanks,
